content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
create EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data_green
    with(
        LOCATION='abfss://nyc-taxi-data@nyctaxistorageadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/trip_data_green_csv'
        )

SELECT
    result.filename() as 'Filename',
    result.filepath(1) as 'Year',
    result.filepath(2) as 'Filepath',
    count(1) as count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_green',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE result.filepath(1)='2020'
AND result.filepath(2) in ('02','03')
GROUP BY result.filename(),result.filepath(1),result.filepath(2)
